meta.title: Machine Feedback Core
meta.description: This is a test RTP schema
meta.author: Joe HMF

title: HMFEvent
description: An event through the HMF System

serviceId.description: High Leve service family of the log //TODO Do we want to leave this as an enum or use an uuid?

sessionId.description: SessionId from SessionManager.  Will be passed forward, can determine Order/User from this

workflowId.description: workflowId assigned in Orchestration.  Maybe available?

microServiceId.description: The ID of the individual microservice for this message

uiTransactionId.description: ID generated that matches to the Matomo instance

simulationFlg.description: Is this a sumulation?  Should we log it?

executionDateTime.description: Execution Start Date and Time that the event occurs in GMT

environment.description: What env the service ran in

eventSummary.description: Summary of the event.  Keep short as this will be displayed to user

payload.description: Input Parameters of the Service (Env Variables) or Optional Payload of the data coming out of Service.

eventDetails.description: Optional Longer Description if more information is provided

stackTrace.description: Optional Stack Trace of the Event.  Will not be captured at all log levels

originalOrderId.description: Optional Provided OrderId in event of a retry?
